images.caption: Figure 1:Framework of local EEND module for DiariZen. Figure adapted from[26].

Figure 2:Overview of the DiCoW model architecture.
The model is based on the Whisper architecture, with modifications to incorporate frame-level diarization information through Frame-Level Diarization Dependent Transformations (FDDT).
Figure adapted from[24].
Figure 3:Example of the ground truth diarization; our system before fine-tuning on MLC; the same system after fine-tuning; and the fine-tuned system with probabilities merged using auxiliary VAD.
